sentence.Network_en: And luxury lies not in richness and ornateness but in the absence of vulgarity.
sentence.Network_cn: 豪华实在不依存于豪阔和富丽,而是闪此刻不粗鄙当中.

sentence.Network_en: Rhythmical prose marked by parallelism and ornateness were no longer popular in later ages.
sentence.Network_cn: “四六体”的文章在后世已经不再流行了.
